SA15jithettu:0_1: pratyakṣam anumānaṃ ca sābhāsaṃ tv ātmasaṃvide //
SA15jithettu:1_0: 2. vādinā svayaṃ sādhayitum iṣṭo 'rthaḥ sādhyaḥ / sādhyate yena tat sādhanam /
SA15jithettu:2_0: 3. hetos trirūpavacanam / kāni punas tāni triṇi rūpāṇi /
SA15jithettu:2_2: sapakṣa eva sattvam iti dvitīyaṃ rūpam /
SA15jithettu:2_3: vipakṣe cāsattvam eva niścitam iti tṛtīyam /
SA15jithettu:3_0: 4. tatra pakṣaḥ prasiddho dharmī prasiddheṇa viśeṣeṇa viśiṣṭaḥ svayaṃ sādhayitum iṣṭaḥ pratyakṣādyaviruddhaḥ /
SA15jithettu:3_1: yathā śabdo dharmī anityatvena viśeṇa viśiṣtaḥ sādhyate kṛtakatvād iti hetuḥ /
SA15jithettu:4_0: 5. kaḥ sapakṣaḥ / sādhyadharmeṇa sāmānyena samānaḥ sapakṣo yathā ghaṭādir iti //
SA15jithettu:5_0: 6. ko vā hetor vipakṣaḥ / yatra sādhyābhāvena hetor abhāvo niyamena kathyate [ yathākāśādir iti //
SA15jithettu:6_0: 7. etad eva ca hetos trirūpavacanaṃ parapratyāyanāya prayujyamānaṃ parārtham anumānam ucyate /
SA15jithettu:6_1: yathā anityaḥ śabda iti pakṣavacanaṃ kṛtakatvād iti hetuvacanam /
SA15jithettu:7_0: 8. tat punar dvividhaṃ dṛṣṭam / sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa ca /
SA15jithettu:8_1: 9. tatra sādharmyeṇa tāvat / yat kṛtakaṃ tat sarvam anityaṃ dṛṣṭam /
SA15jithettu:9_0: 10. vaidharmyeṇa punaḥ / asaty anityatve na bhavaty eva kṛtakatvaṃ yathākāśādau /
SA15jithettu:10_0: 11. kaḥ punaḥ pakṣābhāsaḥ / yaḥ pakṣa ivābhāsate / na tu sākṣāt pakṣo bhavati / pratyakṣādibhir bādhitatvāt /
SA15jithettu:11_0: 12. sa tu pakṣābhāsaḥ / yathā dhūmādir dharmībuddhimatā hetunā janyata iti sādhye /
SA15jithettu:12_0: 13. anumānaviruddho yathā / vedavākyaṃ dharmy apauruṣeyam iti sādhye /
SA15jithettu:13_0: 14. svavacanaviruddho yathā / nānumānaṃ pramāṇam iti parapratipādanāya vacanam uccāryamāṇaṃ parārtham anumānam ity uktatvāt /
SA15jithettu:14_0: 15. lokaviruddho yathā / śuci naraśiraḥkapālaṃ prāṇyaṅgatvāc chaṅkhaśuktivat //
SA15jithettu:15_1: kiyatkālasthāyino 'pi kṛtakāḥ sarve nityā iti lokapratīteḥ /
SA15jithettu:16_0: 17. aprasiddhaviśeṣaṇo yathā / vaiśeṣikasya sāṃkhyaṃ prati vināśī śabda iti sādhye //
SA15jithettu:17_0: 18. aprasiddhaviśeṣyo yathā / sāṃkhyasya bauddhaṃ prati ātmā cetana iti sādhayataḥ //
SA15jithettu:18_0: 19. ubhayāprasiddho yathā / vaiśeṣikasya bauddhaṃ prati sukhādisamavāyikāraṇam ātmeti
SA15jithettu:20_0: 21. hetvābhāsaḥ kīdṛśaḥ / yo hetur ivābhāsate / na punaḥ siddho hetur iti //
SA15jithettu:23_0: 24. pakṣasapakṣayor nāsti / vipakṣa evāsti sa viruddhasaṃjñako hetvābhāsaḥ /
SA15jithettu:24_0: 25. tatra yo hetuḥ sapakṣavipakṣayor ubhayatrāsti nāsti vā saṃdihyate /
SA15jithettu:25_0: 26. ubhayāsiddhaḥ tadyathā śabdasyānityatve sādhye cākṣuṣatvaṃ hetuḥ vādiprativādinor asiddhaḥ //
SA15jithettu:26_0: 27. cetanās tarava iti sādhye sarvatvagapaharaṇe maraṇād iti hetuḥ prativādino bauddhasyāsiddha iti prativādyasiddhaḥ /
SA15jithettu:27_1: utpattimattvād iti hetuḥ svayaṃ vādinaḥ sāṃkhyasyāsiddhaḥ /
SA15jithettu:28_0: 29. vaiśeṣikasya bauddhaṃ prati kṣamādikaṃ dharmī kāryam iti sādhayataḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ sadṛśāparāparotpatter iti svayaṃ vādino 'siddhaḥ /
SA15jithettu:28_1: utpattau siddhāyām api pratikṣaṇasadṛśāparāparotpattir ity asiddhaḥ /
SA15jithettu:29_1: 30. pakṣaikadeśāsiddho yathā / cetanās taravaḥ svāpād iti hetuḥ /
SA15jithettu:29_3: na hi sarve vṛkṣā rātrau patrasaṃkocabhājaḥ /
SA15jithettu:30_0: 31. tathā pṛthivyādikaṃ dharmī buddhimaddhetujanyam iti sādhye kāryatvād iti hetur bauddhaṃ praty asiddhaḥ /
SA15jithettu:30_1: pratyakṣānupalambhanibandhano hi kāryakāraṇabhāvo bauddhasya pṛthivyādau na siddhaḥ /
SA15jithettu:31_0: 32. saṃdigdhāsiddho yathā yady ayaṃ dhūmo 'gnir atreti sādhye hetor evāniścayāt //
SA15jithettu:32_1: iha bahuṣu nikuñjeṣu kvacid ekasmin nikuñje mayūra iti sādhye kekāyikād iti hetuḥ /
SA15jithettu:33_0: 34. dharmyasiddhāv apy asiddho yathā ātmā dharmī sarvagata iti sādhye sarvatropalabhyamānaguṇatvād iti hetuḥ /
SA15jithettu:36_0: 37. yathā śabdasya nityatvādike dharme sādhye prameyatvaṃ hetuḥ sapaksvipakṣayoḥ sarvatra vartamānaḥ sādhāraṇānaikāntikaḥ /
SA15jithettu:37_0: 38. tathā śabdasya nityatve śrāvaṇatvaṃ hetuḥ sapakṣavipakṣayor apravartamānāt /
SA15jithettu:38_2: / aprayatnānantarīyakaḥ śabdasya vidyudākāśādiḥ sapakṣaḥ tatraikadeśe vidyudādau vartate 'nityatvaṃ nākāśādau prayatnāntarīyakaḥ punaḥ sarvo ghaṭādir vipakṣaḥ /
SA15jithettu:39_1: 40. tathā prayatnānantarīyakatve śabdasya sādhye 'nityatvaṃ hetuḥ ghaṭādau sarvatra vidyate /
SA15jithettu:39_4: tasmād ayaṃ vipakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ sapakṣavyāpī hetur anaikāntikaḥ /
SA15jithettu:40_1: śabde dharmiṇi nityatve sādhye 'mūrtatvād iti hetuḥ /
SA15jithettu:40_3: tatraikadeśe 'mūrtatvam ākāśe pravartate na paramāṇau mūrtatvāt paramāṇūnam /
SA15jithettu:41_0: 42. tathā saṃdigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikaḥ sapakṣavyāpī hetur anaikāntiko yathā /
SA15jithettu:41_1: kapilādidharmy asarvajña iti sādhye vaktṛtvād iti hetuḥ /
SA15jithettu:41_4: sarvajñasyātīndriyatvād vacanam asti na veti saṃdigdham /
SA15jithettu:42_0: 43. tathā saṃdigdhasapakṣavṛttir vipakṣavyāpl hetur anaikāntiko yathā /
SA15jithettu:42_1: ṛṣabhavardhāmānādidharmī sarvajña iti sādhye kevaliśāstrakaraṇād iti hetuḥ sapakṣe sarvajñe saṃdigdhaḥ /
SA15jithettu:43_0: 44. saṃdigdhānvayavyatirekahetur anaikāntiko yathā sātmakaṃ jīvaccharīraṃ prāṇādimattvād iti hetuḥ /
SA15jithettu:43_1: jīvaccharīrasaṃbandhī prāṇādir na sātmake anātmake vā pravṛtto nivṛtto veti niścīyate /
SA15jithettu:45_0: 46. tathā dvitīyo 'pi kevalavyatirekī nedaṃ nirātmakaṃ jīvaccharīram aprāṇādimattvaprasaṅgād iti /
SA15jithettu:45_1: dṛṣṭāntābhāvād eva nānvayaniścayo nāpi vyatirekaniścaya iti saṃśayahetuḥ /
SA15jithettu:48_0: 49. yathā śabdo dharmī nitya iti sādhyo dharmaḥ kṛtakatvād ākāśādivat /
SA15jithettu:48_1: ayaṃ hetur ghaṭādau vipakṣa evāsti na sapakṣe /
SA15jithettu:49_0: 50. tathā śabdo dharmī nitya iti sādhye prayatnānantarīyakatvād iti hetur ākāśādau sapakṣe nāsty eva /
SA15jithettu:50_1: cakṣurādaya iti dharmī parārthā iti sādhyo dharmaḥ saṃghatatvād iti hetuḥ /
SA15jithettu:50_3: ayaṃ tu hetur yathā cakṣurādīnāṃ pārārthyaṃ sādhayati /
SA15jithettu:51_0: 52. dharmisvarūpaviparītasādhano yathā pṛthivyādir dharmī buddhimaddhetujanya iti sādhye sāśrayatvād iti hetuḥ /
SA15jithettu:51_2: ayaṃ hetur yathā buddhimaddhetujanyatvaṃ sādhayati tathā buddhimataḥ kartuḥ sāśrayatvam api sādhayati /
SA15jithettu:52_1: vaiśeṣikasya mīmāṃsakaṃ praty ātmā dharmī cetayata iti sādhye [Htu_267] cetanādhiṣṭhānatvād iti hetur ātmano 'cetanasya yathā caitanyaṃ sādhayati /
SA15jithettu:52_2: tathā hetur ayam anityatvam api sādhayati /
SA15jithettu:54_0: 55. viruddhāvyabhicārī nāma na kaścid dhetudoṣo 'stīti na tasyodāharaṇaṃ yuktam /
SA15jithettu:54_1: tatrodāharaṇaṃ / yat sarvadeśāvasthitaiḥ svayaṃ ca svasaṃbandhibhir yugapad abhisaṃbadhyate tat sarvagatam /
SA15jithettu:54_2: yathākāśam iti / abhisaṃbadhyate ca sarvadeśāvasthitaiḥ svasaṃbandhibhir yugapat sāmānyam iti pailukasya svabhāvahetuprayogaḥ /
SA15jithettu:54_4: yad upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ yatra nopalabhyate na tatrāsti /
SA15jithettu:54_7: / anupalambho hetuḥ pūrvoktaś ca svabhāvaḥ parasparaṃ bādhayataḥ /
SA15jithettu:55_0: 56. na sapakṣād anyo dṛṣṭānto nāma kaścid iti sapakṣa eva sādharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ /
SA15jithettu:58_0: 59. nityaḥ śabdo 'mūrtatvāt paramāṇuvat / sādhanavikalaḥ paramāṇūnāṃ mūrtatvāt //
SA15jithettu:60_2: rathyāpuruṣavat / [Htu_268] tatra dṛṣṭānte rathyāpuruṣe rāgādimattvaṃ saṃdigdhaḥ paracetovṛttīnāṃ duranvayatvāt /
SA15jithettu:61_1: kaścit puruṣo maraṇadharma iti sādhye rāgādimattvād iti hetuḥ /
SA15jithettu:62_0: 63. saṃdigdhobhayadharmā dṛṣṭāntābhāso yathā kaścit puruṣo dharmī asarvajña iti sādhye rāgādimattvād iti hetuḥ /
SA15jithettu:64_0: 65. tatrānanvayo yathā / yo vaktā sa rāgādimān rathyāpuruṣavat /
SA15jithettu:65_0: 66. apradarśitānvayo yathā / anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād iti /
SA15jithettu:65_1: atra vidyamāno 'py anvayo vyāptyā na darśita iti /
SA15jithettu:66_0: 67. viparītānvayo yathā / yad anityaṃ tat kṛtakaṃ ghaṭādivad ity atrānityatvaṃ sādhyam /
SA15jithettu:66_2: na tu sādhanena vyāptaṃ sādhyaṃ kathyate /
SA15jithettu:69_2: atra paramāṇor vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntatvād amūrtatvaṃ sādhanadharmo vyāvṛtto [Htu_269] mūrtatvāt paramāṇūnām /
SA15jithettu:71_1: atrākāśādau vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntāt sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ ca na vyāvṛttam /
SA15jithettu:73_2: atra vaidharmyodāharaṇam / yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sa jyotirjñānādikam upadiṣṭavān yathā ṛṣabhavardhamānādir iti /
SA15jithettu:73_3: atra vaidharmyodāharaṇād ṛṣabhavardhamānāder asarvajñatā nivṛttāna veti saṃdehaḥ /
SA15jithettu:74_1: nātra trayīvidā brāhmaṇena grāhyavacanaḥ kapilakaṇādādiḥ puruṣo rāgādimattvād iti /
SA15jithettu:74_2: atra vaidharmyodāharaṇaṃ ye grāhyavacanā na te rāgādimanto yathā gautamādayo dharmaśāstrāṇāṃ praṇetāra iti gautamādibhyo rāgādimattvasya dharmasya vyāvṛttiḥ saṃdigdhā /
SA15jithettu:75_2: atra vaidharmyodāharaṇaṃ yo vītarāgo na tasya parigrahāgrahau saṃbhavataḥ [Htu_270] yathā ṛṣabhavardhamānāder iti /
SA15jithettu:75_3: ṛṣabhāder vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntāt avītarāgatvaṃ sādhyadharmaḥ parigrahāgrahayogaḥ sādhanadharmo vyāvṛtto na veti saṃdehaḥ /
SA15jithettu:75_5: labdhasyāparityāga āgrahaḥ / tau ca dvāv api ṛṣabhādau saṃbhavyete /
SA15jithettu:77_1: yatrāvītarāgatvaṃ nāsti na sa vaktā yathopalakhaṇḍa iti /
SA15jithettu:77_2: yady upalakhaṇḍād ayaṃ vyāvṛttas tathāpi sarvo vītarāgo vakteti saṃdehaḥ /
SA15jithettu:78_0: 79. apradarśitavyatireko yathā / anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād ākāśādivad iti /
SA15jithettu:78_1: paramārthataḥ saṃyag dṛṣṭānto 'py ayaṃ vaktṛdoṣād dṛṣṭāntābhāsaḥ /
SA15jithettu:78_3: tathā hi yan nityaṃ tat sarvaṃ niyamenākṛtakaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathākāśādir iti vacanena vibhajya vaktrā vyāptipūrvako vyātireko na pradarśita ity apradarśitavyatirekaḥ /
SA15jithettu:79_0: 80. viparītavyatireko yathā / yad akṛtakaṃ tan nityaṃ dṛṣṭam iti /
SA15jithettu:79_1: atra sādhananivṛttyā sādhyanivṛttir vyāptā darśayitavyā tena yatra yatra sādhyanivṛttis tatra tatra niyamena sādhananivṛttiḥ sidhyatīti /
SA15jithettu:81_1: vādinā sādhayitum iṣṭam arthaṃ na sādhayantīti sādhanābhāsā [Htu_271] vādino bhavanti /
SA15jithettu:81_2: evaṃ ca prativādinā dūṣaṇatvenopanyastā dūṣaṇāni bhavanti /
SA15jithettu:81_4: sādhanasya nyūnatodbhāvanam eva dūṣaṇasya lakṣaṇaṃ vibhajya pṛthag ucyate /
SA15jithettu:82_1: yadā pūrvapakṣavādī mithyādūṣaṇatvena pratipādayatīti tadā dūṣaṇābhāsā jātaya iti paṭhyante /
SA15jithettu:83_0: 84. tatra pratijñāhetudāharaṇopanayanigamanāni pañcāvayavaṃ paraiḥ sādhanam ucyate /
SA15jithettu:83_1: yathānityaḥ śabda iti pratijñā kṛtakatvād iti hetuḥ /
SA15jithettu:83_2: yat kṛtakaṃ tat sarvam anityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā ghaṭādīty udāharaṇam /
SA15jithettu:83_5: dṛṣṭānte pratītisamartho hetur dharmiṇy upanīyata ity upanayaḥ /
SA15jithettu:83_7: naitad asti / tribhir evāvayavair anvayavyatirekapakṣadharmasaṃjñakaiḥ sādhyārthasiddheḥ /
SA15jithettu:84_0: 85. tathā hi / vādakāle vyāptipūrvaka eva prayogaḥ kartavyaḥ /
SA15jithettu:84_1: yat kṛtakaṃ tat sarvam anityaṃ dṛstaṃ yathā ghaṭādir iti /
SA15jithettu:84_2: sādhyena sādhanasya dṛṣṭānte vyāptikathanam anvaya ucyate /
SA15jithettu:85_0: 86. vipakṣe ca sādhyanivṛttyā sādhananivṛttir vyatireka ucyate yathāsaty anityatve na bhavaty eva kṛtakatvaṃ yathākāśādau /
SA15jithettu:86_1: 87. kṛtakaś ca śabda iti pakṣadharmavacanam / pratijñānigamane punaḥ sarvathā na vaktavye //
SA15jithettu:87_0: 88. tathā sādharmyavati prayoge 'nvayābhidhānasāmarthyād eva vyatireko 'vagantavya iti na pṛthag ucyate /
SA15jithettu:87_1: yathā yat kṛtakaṃ tat sarvam anityaṃ draṣṭavyam /
SA15jithettu:87_2: yathā ghaṭādiḥ / kṛtakaś ca śabda iti / sādharmyavān prayogaḥ / tathā vaidharmyavati prayoge vyatirekoktisāmarthyād evānvayaḥ pratipanna iti nānvayaḥ punar ucyate /
SA15jithettu:87_3: yan nityaṃ tad akṛtakaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathākāśādiḥ kṛtakaś ca śabda iti /
SA15jithettu:89_1: pratigatam āśritam akṣaṃ yad vijñānaṃ tat pratyakṣam /
SA15jithettu:89_3: atyādayaḥ krāntādyarthe dvitiyayeti samāsena pratyakṣaśabdo vācyaliṅgaḥ siddhaḥ /
SA15jithettu:90_0: 91. cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyākhyāni pañcendriyāṇi tadāśritāni pañca jñānāni pramāṇāni /
SA15jithettu:91_0: 92. tac ca pratyakṣaṃ nāmajātyādikalpanārahitaṃ nirvikalpakam abhrāntaṃ ca yadi bhavati /
SA15jithettu:92_0: 93. tatra nāmakalpanā / devadatto 'yam iti yad jñānam /
SA15jithettu:92_2: viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyam [Htu_273] iti kalpanā nīlotpalam iti jñānaṃ /
SA15jithettu:92_5: śuktikāyāṃ rajatajñānaṃ sthāṇur ayaṃ puruṣo veti jñānam /
SA15jithettu:93_0: 94. tatra trividhaṃ pratyakṣaṃ / vyavahāram apekṣya indriyajñānam /
SA15jithettu:94_0: 95. tasya viṣayaḥ svalakṣaṇam arthakriyāsamarthaṃ tu svalakṣaṇam ucyate /
SA15jithettu:95_1: pramāṇam arthapratītirūpaṃ phalaṃ ca tādṛśam eva /
SA15jithettu:97_0: 98. tatra svārthaṃ tāvat / gṛhīte ca pakṣadharme smṛte ca sādhyasādhanabhāve paścāt pratipattā yathārthaṃ pratipadyate yena tat svārtham anumānam /
SA15jithettu:98_0: 99. pakṣadharmaś ca trividha eva bhavati / kāryaṃ svabhāvo 'nupalambhaś ceti /
SA15jithettu:99_0: 100. siddhe hi kāryakāraṇabhāve kāryaṃ hetur draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA15jithettu:99_2: yathā mahānasādau / asti ceha dhūma iti [ asaty agnau na bhavaty eva dhūmo yathā sajalapradeśe /
SA15jithettu:100_1: asati vṛkṣatve na bhavaty eva śiṃśapātvam /
SA15jithettu:100_2: yathā sthaṇḍilapradeśe / atrāpi vyāpyavyāpakabhāve niścite sati vyāpyo hetur draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA15jithettu:101_1: 102. anupalambhahetur yathā / nātra ghaṭa upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdheḥ śaśaviṣāṇādivat /
SA15jithettu:101_2: atrāpi dṛṣyānupalambho dṛṣyābhavena vyāpto yadā niścitas tadāyaṃ hetur gamakaḥ /
SA15jithettu:102_0: 103. anumānābhāsaḥ kīdṛśaḥ / pūrvavat / śeṣavat / sāmānyatodṛṣṭaṃ ceti paraiḥ kalpitam anumānaṃ sarvam anumānābhāsaḥ /
SA15jithettu:102_1: / teṣu tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇasya pratibandhābhāvāt [ siddhe saty eva hi kāryakāraṇabhāve vyāpyavyāpakabhāve ca sādhyasādhanabhāvo nānyathā vyabhicārasaṃbhavāt /
SA15jithettu:103_0: 104. yathā vṛṣṭimān ayaṃ megho gambhīradhvanatvād iti /
